languages.text: {n}Маршал щелкает пальцами по черепу Глейто. Мастиф дергается, как от болтерного выстрела, но покорно включает очередную запись. Вы узнаете голос Соломона.{/n}
{n}The Marshal snaps his fingers over Glaito's head. The cyber-mastiff flinches as if from a bolter shot, but obediently plays another recording. You recognise Solomorne's voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маршал щелкает пальцами по черепу Глейто. Мастиф дергается, как от болтерного выстрела, но покорно включает очередную запись. Вы узнаете голос Соломона.{/n}

{n}The Marshal snaps his fingers over Glaito's head. The cyber-mastiff flinches as if from a bolter shot, but obediently plays another recording. You recognise Solomorne's voice.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Marschall schnippt über Glaitos Kopf mit den Fingern. Der Cyber-Mastiff zuckt zurück, als wäre er von einem Bolter getroffen worden, spielt aber gehorsam eine weitere Aufzeichnung ab. Du erkennst Solomornes Stimme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal snaps his fingers over Glaito's head. The cyber-mastiff flinches as if from a bolter shot, but obediently plays another recording. You recognise Solomorne's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Marschall schnippt über Glaitos Kopf mit den Fingern. Der Cyber-Mastiff zuckt zurück, als wäre er von einem Bolter getroffen worden, spielt aber gehorsam eine weitere Aufzeichnung ab. Du erkennst Solomornes Stimme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le maréchal claque des doigts au-dessus de la tête de Glaito. Le cyber-mastiff tressaille comme sous l'effet d'un tir de bolter, mais lance docilement un nouvel enregistrement. Vous reconnaissez la voix de Solomorne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal snaps his fingers over Glaito's head. The cyber-mastiff flinches as if from a bolter shot, but obediently plays another recording. You recognise Solomorne's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maréchal claque des doigts au-dessus de la tête de Glaito. Le cyber-mastiff tressaille comme sous l'effet d'un tir de bolter, mais lance docilement un nouvel enregistrement. Vous reconnaissez la voix de Solomorne.{/n}

languages.text: {n}元帅在格雷托头上打了个响指。这只生化獒犬畏缩了一下，仿佛被爆矢枪击中了一样，但还是顺从地播放了另一段录音。你听出了索罗蒙的声音。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal snaps his fingers over Glaito's head. The cyber-mastiff flinches as if from a bolter shot, but obediently plays another recording. You recognise Solomorne's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}元帅在格雷托头上打了个响指。这只生化獒犬畏缩了一下，仿佛被爆矢枪击中了一样，但还是顺从地播放了另一段录音。你听出了索罗蒙的声音。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Mariscal Marshal chasca los dedos sobre la cabeza de Glaito. El cibermastín se encoge como si hubiera oído un disparo, pero reproduce otra grabación sin rechistar. Reconoces la voz de Solomorne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal snaps his fingers over Glaito's head. The cyber-mastiff flinches as if from a bolter shot, but obediently plays another recording. You recognise Solomorne's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Mariscal Marshal chasca los dedos sobre la cabeza de Glaito. El cibermastín se encoge como si hubiera oído un disparo, pero reproduce otra grabación sin rechistar. Reconoces la voz de Solomorne.{/n}

languages.text: {n}将帥がグライトの頭上で指を鳴らした。サイバーマスチフはボルターの銃撃を受けたかのように身をすくめたが、素直に別の録音を再生する。ソロモーンの声だと分かった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal snaps his fingers over Glaito's head. The cyber-mastiff flinches as if from a bolter shot, but obediently plays another recording. You recognise Solomorne's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}将帥がグライトの頭上で指を鳴らした。サイバーマスチフはボルターの銃撃を受けたかのように身をすくめたが、素直に別の録音を再生する。ソロモーンの声だと分かった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Miralay, Glaito'nun başı üzerinde parmaklarını şıklatıyor. Siber mastif, çarpılmışçasına irkilse de itaat edip bir başka kaydı oynatıyor. Solomorne'un sesini duyuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal snaps his fingers over Glaito's head. The cyber-mastiff flinches as if from a bolter shot, but obediently plays another recording. You recognise Solomorne's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Miralay, Glaito'nun başı üzerinde parmaklarını şıklatıyor. Siber mastif, çarpılmışçasına irkilse de itaat edip bir başka kaydı oynatıyor. Solomorne'un sesini duyuyorsun.{/n}
